last_episode_to_air.name: WE ARE ALL SICK
last_episode_to_air.overview: A video of Chico spreads quickly, leading to a brutal attack. Alex exposes the source of the disease. Progresso parents unite to cure their teens.

name: Kissing Game
overview: At a high school in a rural, isolated ranching community, families panic when teens contract a mysterious "kissing disease" that quickly spreads.

episodes.name: got you!
episodes.overview: Her friends are alarmed when high school student Bel is stricken with a strange illness after a wild night of forbidden dancing, drugs, and kissing.

episodes.name: friday night-monday morning
episodes.overview: As Bel worsens, her friends map everyone who kissed at the party. Chico and Alex pursue secret romances. Fran worries about her mother's health.

episodes.name: easy when that doesn't affect you
episodes.overview: Controversy erupts over Bel's burial and a kissing map goes viral on social media, fracturing the community as more students develop symptoms.

episodes.name: are you looking?
episodes.overview: Fran languishes in the hospital while Alex and Chico try to solve the mystery of Manu's whereabouts – and the truth behind another rave in the forest.

episodes.name: unfollow
episodes.overview: The youth of Progresso become more rebellious. Alex and Chico try to save Fran by bringing her to the village. Alex uncovers a dark family secret.

episodes.name: WE ARE ALL SICK
episodes.overview: A video of Chico spreads quickly, leading to a brutal attack. Alex exposes the source of the disease. Progresso parents unite to cure their teens.
